title: Database Query Optimization
prompt:
Optimize this SQL query for better performance and explain your changes:

```sql
SELECT u.name, COUNT(*) as order_count
FROM users u, orders o, products p
WHERE u.id = o.user_id
AND o.product_id = p.id
AND p.category = 'electronics'
AND o.order_date > '2023-01-01'
GROUP BY u.name
ORDER BY order_count DESC;
```

evaluation_criteria.task_success: Working code that solves the problem
evaluation_criteria.explanation: Clear explanation of changes and reasoning
